actions.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-161, by Mr. Carter (TX).
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 128.

official_title: Making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.
short_title: Military Construction, Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026

titles.title: Military Construction, Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
